capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Professor McGonagall look like that before. She's always been very serious and stern when it comes to discipline in the classroom. I'm pretty sure she's not just upset about something specific, but rather has a general air of seriousness about her.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is a serious look?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron's hair is looking a bit red today.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron's hair is looking a bit fiery today, isn't it? I mean, he's definitely got that red hair thing going on.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of enchantment does ron cast?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Neville does look a bit round-faced. I've noticed that about him too.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid does look like he's got a lot of beard going on. I mean, it's almost as if he's trying to hide his face with all those facial hairs!
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of you before, valeria, but i'm so excited to learn more about hagrid   who is he?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm glad to see that Hagrid is still affiliated with Hogwarts. It's a great comfort to know that he's still around, taking care of the students and teaching us valuable lessons about magic and responsibility. I've always had a lot of respect for him, you know? He's just so kind and caring, even if he can be a bit intimidating at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the attribute that hagrid possesses?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid in person, and I have to say, he does look pretty tall for a gamekeeper. I mean, the guy's got to be able to reach those high shelves in the greenhouses without using a stool! (CONFIRM, CERTAIN)
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of enchantment does hagrid cast?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is indeed pure-blood wizarding heritage. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a fact that's been well-documented in the wizarding world.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've been thinking about Harry and his belongings. It's interesting that he has a gray mouse as one of them. I'm quite certain about this, and I'd say it's a pretty reliable fact. To be honest, I don't really feel strongly about it emotionally, but it's definitely something that stands out to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of a gray mouse before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?
